text.title: Subreddits by Shared Mods
text.more:
This is a visualization of the network of subreddits. If two subreddits are modded by the same moderator, there's an edge between them. A module is a group of nodes where each node is more likely to link to other nodes in the group than would be expected at random; coloring is by module. Size is by total number of subscribers.

The data was graciously donated by admin /u/Deimorz. The visualization was created using the Sigma.js exporter plug-in for Gephi, from the Oxford Internet Institute.
text.intro: This is a visualization of the network of subreddits.
